author: Staff Reporter
text:
Lighting of Laksha Deepam normally done on Sivarathiri every year in Sri Arunachaleswarar temple, Tiruvannamalai has been cancelled due to the ongoing renovation works.

Usually devotees light one lakh earthen lamps all over the temple.

Temple sources said that it was a precautionary measure because all gopurams are covered with wooden scaffolding. Even a small spark would prove disastrous, said the temple authorities.
title: Laksha deepam not lit in Arunachaleswarar Temple
